name: Diner Dash 2: Restaurant Rescue
summary: Diner Dash 2: Restaurant Rescue is the second installment in the popular game series Diner Dash preceded by Diner Dash and followed by Diner Dash: Flo on the Go. It is published by PlayFirst, like all other Diner Dash series.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 经营
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2006年1月18日
  • 开发: PlayFirst
  • 发行: PlayFirst
